doRegistration(RegisterData) - Method in class pt.unl.fct.di.apdc.firstwebapp.resources.RegisterResource
The above function is a Java method that handles user registration by validating input data, checking for existing usernames and emails, creating a new user entity in a datastore, sending a verification email, and creating a new user record in Firebase.
